slides.title: Indian Geography
slides.content:
**Location:**
- Northern Hemisphere
- Area: 3.287 million kmÂ²
- States: 28, UTs: 8

**Physical Features:**
- Mountains: Himalayas, Vindhyas, Satpura
- Plains: Indo-Gangetic Plain
- Plateaus: Deccan, Malwa
- Deserts: Thar
- Coastal: 7,517 km

slides.title: Rivers & Climate
slides.content:
**Major Rivers:**
- Ganga: 2,525 km (longest)
- Brahmaputra, Godavari, Krishna
- Narmada, Tapti (westward flow)

**Climate:**
- Tropical monsoon
- Seasons: Summer, Monsoon, Winter
- Southwest monsoon (June-Sept)

question.questionText: Which is the longest river in India?
question.explanation: Ganga is the longest at 2,525 km
